title: Practice Exercise
description:
Build a **Ticket Pricing Calculator** for a movie theater that determines the ticket price based on age. **Pricing Rules:** - **Child (under 13):** $8.00 - **Adult (13 and over):** $15.00 **Your task:** - Ask the user for their age - Use if-else to determine which price category they fall into - Display the ticket price and category - Calculate total for multiple tickets (bonus) **Example output:** 
=== Movie Theater Ticket Pricing ===

Enter your age: 10

Ticket Category: Child
Ticket Price: $8.00

How many tickets? 3
Total: $24.00

Enjoy the show!

hints.text: Use 'age < 13' for the child condition. Remember that else automatically handles everything that's NOT under 13, so you don't need a condition on else. Child price is 8.00, adult price is 15.00. For total, multiply price by quantity.

commonMistakes.correction: Add : at the end of the line
